dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and gradient tints. Depth shown by shading and bathymetric tints. "Published December 2018." Shows gas fields, gas pipelines, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, and offshore terminals. Includes descriptive legend, timeline for 2018, statistical tables and graphs. Insets: Mainland Japan LNG import terminals (only) -- Northwest Shelf (Australia) -- East Africa. Ancillary maps: West of Shetland (United Kingdom) -- Norwegian Sea (Norway) --Trinidad & Tobago -- Deepwater Gulf of Mexico (United States) -- Indonesia (Makassar Strait). Produced by Petroleum Economist, a division of Gulf Publishing, in partnership with Chevron. "CGG NPA Satellite mapping." Other sources: BP statistical review of world energy, Cedigaz Paris, Energy Information Administration, International energy agency and Wood Mackenzie.
